attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the NHS, GPs, Schools and all other state services full and costing the state (us) billions we Demand immigration to be stopped immediately. Not only is it costing us billions in state benefits but there's also the security risk with todays terrorist threats. With nobody knowing exactly who's here and who's gone home its time to freeze the numbers and try to catch up with the thousands of illegals that are already here.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
